Text: No installation. No Registration. Carry and operate from pendrive. Works perfectly. Thanks^_^

thank you thank you thank you.
Works perfect! This is the absolute BEST.

I installed this in my Win7 64-bit PC after my earlier Nero 12 installation got corrupted. So far, this portable application is working fine. I am amazed that 1GB worth of Nero Burning ROM could be accommodated in this small 27MB standalone app. This is mind-boggling!

My next comment was going to be THANK YOU but this doesn't work for the only thing I downloaded it for.  I wanted to overburn MP3s to regular audio CD but whenever I traverse to any folder with an MP3 in it, it crashes.  Dragging an MP3 into the list results in the "no" symbol. No wonder this is so small.
